text: Paul Walter Hauser (born October 15, 1986) is an American actor, comedian and wrestler. He played supporting roles in the movies I, Tonya and BlacKkKlansman, and in 2019 had his breakout performance as the main character in the movie Richard Jewell. It won him the National Board of Review to award him for best Breakthrough Performance. He voiced Embarrassment in the Pixar film Inside Out 2 (2024). ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Michigan Category:American comedians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Michigan Category:People from Grand Rapids, Michigan
title: Paul Walter Hauser
